body_html:
Well I agree we should fix array_ops.cc too, but you don't just need to fix the -1 case right? you need to fix -2 because otherwise you'll mill -2 which also needs the same treatment. Also, you have to consider that s may be a tensor itself so you can't actually compare it to 1 with an if condition. So you may need to do this:

  else:
    strides.append(1)
    begin.append(s)
    const_s = tensor_util.constant_value(s)
    if const_s is not None:
      end.append(s+1 if s>=0 else s-1)
    else:
      end.append(tf.where(s>=0, s+1, s-1))
    shrink_axis_mask |= (1 << index)
